snippet: The choreographer Burr Johnson and his dancers, in his first full evening of work, performed his “Special Collections” and “Shimmering Islands.”
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews premiere of dance pieces Special Collections and Shimmering Islands, performed and choreographed by Burr Johnson, at Danspace Project.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Burr Johnson and his dancers, in his first full evening of work, performed his “Special Collections” and “Shimmering Islands.”

headline.main: Contemporary Movement With a Foot (or a Leg) in Earlier Times
headline.print_headline: Contemporary Movement With a Foot (or a Leg) in Earlier Times
